explanation: [0-0] A man and a woman are standing in front of a white wall. The man, wearing a white T-shirt and black athletic shorts, stands on the left with his legs apart, looking in the woman's direction. The woman, wearing a black sports bra and mint green leggings, stands on the right with her legs together and knees slightly bent, smiling and looking to the right front while holding her hair up with both hands. In front of them is a 0.5M high, red, cylindrical object. Above the man's head is the English caption "Bro:", and above the woman's head is the English caption "Me:". A white round clock hangs on the wall behind them.

[0-6] The woman first lifts her left foot and steps onto the red cylinder, placing her hands on her knees and looking at the man. The man then lifts his right foot onto the cylinder, resting his right arm on his thigh and smiling at the woman across from him. The cylinder then raises to 1M, and the woman lifts her left foot onto it again, looking at the man and then turning her head to the left front. The man follows suit and puts his left foot up, with both of them raising their right hands in a gesture.
